List how much money you like to set aside for each item. For example: 100 dollars a week for food
List how much money you actually spend. For example: more or less than 100 dollars a week
Enter your total monthly allowance. For example: monthly allowance of 100 dollars
Enter all the money from last month that you owe to others. For example: a burger worth 8 dollars bought by Stacey.
Make notes such as: focus on needs not wants!
